channel.title: Portfolio Website of Lexi Su
channel.description: Recent content on Portfolio Website of Lexi Su

item.title: HR analysis
item.description: IBM data scientists created this fictitional data set to document many job-related characteristics such as employees’ ages, job satisfaction and outcomes like job salaries and attrition. Are there potential relationships between these variables? Let’s explore. First, let’s visualize the data by looking at some histograms. ggplot(hr_cleaned,aes(x=age))+ geom_histogram()+ labs(title = "Distribution of Employee Ages", subtitle = "Most number of employees are between age 30 and 35", x = "Age", y = "Number of People")+ theme_igray()+ theme(title = element_text(size =12,face = "bold"), axis.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
